Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.name: interstitialDidReceiveAd(ad:)
Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate an ad request loaded an ad.

Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.name: interstitialDidFailToReceiveAd(ad:message:code:)
Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate an ad request failed.

Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.name: interstitialWillPresentScreen(ad:)
Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate that an interstitial will be presented.

Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.name: interstitialWillDismissScreen(ad:)
Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate the interstitial is to be animated off the screen.

Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.name: interstitialDidDismissScreen(ad:)
Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate the interstitial had been animated off the screen.

Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.name: interstitialWillLeaveApplication(ad:)
Protocols/RewardAdInterstitialDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate that a user click will open another app

Protocols/RewardADBannerViewDelegate.htm.name: didReceiveAd(bannerView:)
Protocols/RewardADBannerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: Ad request has loaded an ad delegate.

Protocols/RewardADBannerViewDelegate.htm.name: RewardADBannerViewDelegate
Protocols/RewardADBannerViewDelegate.htm.abstract: RADBannerViewDelegate (this covers callback of Banner Ad status change).

Protocols/AdPortalDelegate.html.name: AdPortalDelegate
Protocols/AdPortalDelegate.html.abstract: Rakuten Reward SDK delegate. Has delegates for open ad portal successful, fail to open ad portal, close ad portal successful.

Protocols/RakutenRewardDelegate.html.name: RakutenRewardDelegate
Protocols/RakutenRewardDelegate.html.abstract: Rakuten Reward SDK delegate. Has delegates for RakutenRewardStatus change, mission achievement data updated, and user updated.

Protocols/RakutenRewardSessionDelegate.h.name: RakutenRewardSessionDelegate
Protocols/RakutenRewardSessionDelegate.h.abstract: Rakuten Reward SDK delegate for Sign in and Sign out APIs

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: hexadecimalString()
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Create hexadecimal string representation of Data object.

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: memberInfoError
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Member information error (after sign in, SDK cannot get user infromation correctly).

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: sdkStatusError
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: SDK status error (SDK Cookies are missing, the user should be anonymous user or SDK is disabled).

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: processParameterError
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Parameter error (cannot get sign in parameters from server).

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: memberInfoSpecialError
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Bad request for MemberInfo, when there’s unexpected Cookie Storage behavior, please startSession again.

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: jsError
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Javascript error (background WebView javascript run error. This includes username and password wrong error).

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: logOutDidHappenOnServer
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Log out already happened on server side, cancelling the log out has failed.

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.name: logInDidHappenOnServer
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Log in already happened on server side, cancelling the log out has failed.

Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.name: online
Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.abstract: SDK is Online and ready to use.

Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.name: appCodeInvalid
Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.abstract: Application code (key) is invalid (please check your key).

Enums/OpenAdPortalError.html#/c:@M@Rakut.name: appCodeInvalid
Enums/OpenAdPortalError.html#/c:@M@Rakut.abstract: Appcode is invalid. Please check your appcode

Enums/OpenAdPortalError.html.name: OpenAdPortalError
Enums/OpenAdPortalError.html.abstract: Error cases for open ad portal from RakutenReward.sharedInstance object

Enums/RWFrequency.html.name: RWFrequency
Enums/RWFrequency.html.abstract: The frequency of Reward SDK’s data collection.

Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html.name: RewardSessionErrorCode
Enums/RewardSessionErrorCode.html.abstract: Reward Session Error Code (This is for Signin and Signout API).

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: enableManualLocationPermissionRequest
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: This configuration is deprecated and no longer supported. Will be removed in future version.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isDebug
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: Get more logs from Reward SDK by setting isDebug to true. isDebug is false by default.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isUserSettingUIEnabled
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: Mission’s achievement notification UI (Banner, Modal, etc) setting. If this setting is set to false, SDK will not show notification to users.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isMissionEventFeatureEnabled
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: Get the enable status of mission X event feature

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: isDebug
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Get more logs from Reward SDK by setting isDebug to true. isDebug is false by default.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: logAction(actionCode:isQueueEnabled:)
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Log action with action code with queue. Use this method when logging multiple actions.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: openPortal()
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Open webview for Reward SDK portal page.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: openAdPortal(delegate:)
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Open webview for Reward SDK advertisement portal page.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: addBlockListURL(urlSet:)
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Add URL to block list to block access to a specific URL.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: updateMissionList()
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Update user’s mission list (save into user data).

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: isUIEnabled()
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Mission’s achievement notification UI (Banner, Modal, etc) setting.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: setUIEnabled(enabled:)
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Set SDK Mission’s achievement notification UI setting.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: didUpdateLocation(longitude:latitude:timeStamp:)
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: This API is deprecated and no longer supported. Will be removed in future version.

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@CM@Rakute.name: cancelSignIn()
Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@CM@Rakute.abstract: Cancel Sign in API(This API can be called when Sign in API is working)

Classes/RakutenReward.html#/c:@CM@Rakute.abstract: Cancel sign out(This API can be called when Sign out API is working)

Classes/RewardPortalButton/BadgePosition.name: BadgePosition
Classes/RewardPortalButton/BadgePosition.abstract: Badge position (top left, top right, bottom left, bottom right, center, custom)

Classes/MissionAchievementData.html#/c:@.abstract: Initialization for mission achievement class, internal use only.

Classes/MissionAchievementData.html#/c:@.name: setAchievedDateStr(achievedDateStr:)
Classes/MissionAchievementData.html#/c:@.abstract: For internal use only, need to be public for Unity.

Classes/User.html#/s:16RakutenRewardSDK4.name: isEqual(object:)
Classes/User.html#/s:16RakutenRewardSDK4.abstract: To compare if two users are equal.

Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.name: locationId
Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Location ID to be used for filtering advertisement.

Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.name: delegate
Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Delegate object which include did receive advertisement, fail to receive advertisement, and etc.

Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.name: showAd()
Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Show interstitial/fullscreen advertisement on app’s top view.

Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.name: supportedInterfaceOrientations
Classes/RewardAdInterstitial.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Both portait and landscape is supported for iPad. Only portrait is supported for other devices.

Classes/RakutenAdView.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.name: delegate
Classes/RakutenAdView.html#/c:@M@Rakuten.abstract: Delegate for advertisement such as did receive ads, failed to receive ads, did click ads, did update ads visibility.

Classes/RewardAdbannerView.html.name: RewardAdbannerView
Classes/RewardAdbannerView.html.abstract: AdSDK banner advertisement includes banner, large banner, and rectangle size.

Classes/RakutenRewardAds.html.name: RakutenRewardAds
Classes/RakutenRewardAds.html.abstract: An object that contains information about Rakuten Reward SDK Ads information

Classes/User.html.name: User
Classes/User.html.abstract: An object that contains information about user, such as sign in status, unclaimed mission count, points, and mission list.

Classes/MissionAchievementData.html.name: MissionAchievementData
Classes/MissionAchievementData.html.abstract: An object that contains information about mission achievement, such as getting the mission’s name, action code, instruction, icon url, notification type etc.

Classes/RewardPortalButton.html.name: RewardPortalButton
Classes/RewardPortalButton.html.abstract: Rakuten Reward SDK default portal button UI.

Classes/RewardPortalBarButtonItem.html.name: RewardPortalBarButtonItem
Classes/RewardPortalBarButtonItem.html.abstract: Rakuten Reward SDK default portal bar button UI

Classes/RakutenReward.html.name: RakutenReward
Classes/RakutenReward.html.abstract: An object that contains information about Rakuten Reward SDK basic functions, such as SDK initialization, log action, open portal and etc.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html.name: RewardConfiguration
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html.abstract: An object to set settings or configuration for Rakuten Reward SDK.

Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
